cast.name: 伊娃·简祖罗娃 Iva Janzurová
伊戈尔·巴雷斯 Igor Bares
安娜·盖伊斯洛娃 Anna Geislerová
克里斯托弗·哈德克 Krystof Hádek
杰里·马哈萨克 Jirí Machácek

awards:
第50届圣塞巴斯蒂安国际电影节(2002)
　　最佳新导演 爱丽丝·奈莉
introduction: A dark and absurd road-movie comedy in which the grandmother fulfills a dream, the mother stops treating her daughters like kids, the daughters stop treating their husbands like idiots, and the father's ashes get spread all over the country. It's almost six months since he died and his ashes are still in grandma's cupboard. Everyone in the family seems to have grieved enough and each has his or her own new problems. Younger daughter, Zuzana is about to leave her husband Pavel for a slightly more successful painter of abstract pictures. Her sister, Ilona, mischievous little Leon's exhausted and pregnant mother, feels neglected by a husband who seems to enjoy referring to her as head-cheese. Their mother, Milada, feels more and more useless and constantly invades Ilona's household offering help and nearly driving her son-in-law crazy. And grandma silently dreams about returning to her hometown in Slovakia at least once before she dies. Thus it's probably no accident that she refuses to ...
